SignIn.subtitle: Enter your details to Sign in

WhyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Nakiese?
WhyChooseUs.subtitle: Experience the vibrant essence of authentic African living with a platform built on trust, quality, and convenience.

features.best_price_desc: We ensure you get the most competitive rates for African stays, matching any lower price you find.
features.locations_desc: Every hotel and restaurant is personally verified to ensure it meets our 'Gateway to the Exceptional' standard.
features.secure_desc: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security. Book with confidence and peace of mind.
features.support_desc: Our team is available around the clock to assist you, from check-in to check-out.

SignInBanner.description: Register yourself for a better experience and save money on your next purchase.

Testimonials.title: Loved by Travelers
Testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. See what adventurers from around the world are saying about their Nakiese experience.

review_1.name: Sarah Jenkins
review_1.text: Nakiese made our honeymoon to Zanzibar absolutely magical. The hotel recommendation was spot on, and the booking process was seamless.

review_2.name: David Okafor
review_2.text: Finally, a platform that truly understands African luxury. I booked a business dinner through their restaurant finder and it was impeccable.

review_3.name: Elena Rodriguez
review_3.text: The 24/7 support team helped me change my reservation last minute without any hassle. Highly recommended for peace of mind!

Newsletter.title: Unlock Exclusive Savings
Newsletter.desc_part2: your first booking, plus secret deals sent to your inbox.

validation.min_age: You must be at least 16 years old

delete_account.desc: Permanently remove your account and data.
delete_account.warning_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please check your password.

Booking.title: My Bookings
Booking.subtitle: Manage and view your booking history.

empty.completed: You haven't completed any bookings yet.

Hero.description: Nakiese is more than a booking platform. We are your gateway to the authentic, the luxurious, and the undiscovered gems of Africa.

Mission.desc_p1: Founded in 2020, Nakiese started with a simple question: "Why is it so hard to find authentic, high-quality stays in Africa online?"
Mission.desc_p2: Today, we connect thousands of travelers with curated hotels and restaurants that meet strict standards of quality, safety, and hospitality. We believe travel should be seamless, inspiring, and deeply connected to local communities.

Team.title: Meet the Visionaries
Team.subtitle: A diverse team of travel enthusiasts, tech experts, and hospitality veterans working together to make your trip unforgettable.

amara.bio: Visionary leader with 15+ years in African tourism development.

david.bio: Ensuring seamless experiences from booking to check-out.

sarah.bio: Personally verifying every hotel and restaurant on our platform.

james.bio: Building the robust tech infrastructure that powers Nakiese.

Hero.title: Get in Touch
Hero.subtitle: Have a question about a booking, a property, or just want to say hello? We're here to help 24/7.

Form.success_desc: Thank you for reaching out. Our team will get back to you within 24 hours.
Form.subject: Subject
Form.placeholder_msg: How can we help you today?

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about your bookings and account.

questions.cancel: How do I cancel my booking?
questions.cancel_ans: You can cancel your booking directly from your 'My Bookings' page. Cancellation policies vary by property.
questions.payment_ans: Yes, we use enterprise-grade encryption (SSL) and partner with trusted payment gateways like Stripe and PayPal.
questions.weather: Do you offer refunds for bad weather?
questions.weather_ans: Refunds strictly depend on the hotel or restaurant's policy. We recommend purchasing travel insurance.
questions.groups: Can I book for large groups?
questions.groups_ans: Absolutely! For groups larger than 10, please use the form above to contact our dedicated Group Travel team.

Header.title: Find Your Perfect Stay
